TextLibrary.Text: Are you going to follow them?
Are you going to follow them?
Yes. But first we'll need to upgrade our weapons and get supplies. I don't want to go up against this thing unprepared. Where's the best place around here?
Yes. But first we'll need to upgrade our weapons and get supplies. I don't want to go up against this thing unprepared. Where's the best place around here?
You lucky! Lucky, lucky, lucky! Keck Trader is in next system. You want it, they have it.
You lucky! Lucky, lucky, lucky! Keck Trader is in next system. You want it, they have it.
They have a weapon trader there?
They have a weapon trader there?
Emporium of Keck is big. Big, big, big! But best weapons are with black market trader at Keck Sigma Moon.
Emporium of Keck is big. Big, big, big! But best weapons are with black market trader at Keck Sigma Moon.
